name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShopifyHunt - Shopify & Aliexpress Spy and Dropship Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We conducted a comprehensive analysis of Shopify and AliExpress to help you quickly understand stores and identify niche products.
short.zh_CN: 针对Shopify店铺和速卖通产品进行了全方面分析，包括店铺产品、广告流量、销售情况等， 以便您快速了解某个店铺，快速找到利基产品。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Comprehensive analysis of Shopify stores, including store products, advertising traffic, sales, etc., to help you quickly understand any store.

Supports analysis of AliExpress products and multiple products from list pages, helping you quickly find niche products. Single product analysis is more detailed, further assisting you in evaluating product strengths and weaknesses. Product reviews are also analyzed to obtain consumer purchase motivations and expectations. It supports searching for identical sources of goods on platforms like 1688, AliExpress, and Shopify.

ShopifyHunt is your best tool for monitoring e-commerce, independent websites, and dropshipping business competitors. Our tool helps you uncover your competitors' profit secrets. With just one click, you can dive deep into competitors' product research and pricing strategies. Apply these award-winning techniques to your dropshipping business, and your independent or dropshipping store will become increasingly popular. Your sales will rise faster than you ever imagined!

With a comprehensive analysis of each product on AliExpress and daily recommendations of top-selling items, you will never have to worry about what to sell next! Use ShopifyHunt to quickly compare prices and evaluate seller reputations to maximize your profit margin! You can also gain insights into Shopify competitors selling the same products, allowing you to make more informed decisions!

👋 👋 What are the main features? 
💰 1. AliExpress Product Research With ShopifyHunt, you can find lower-priced, higher-selling similar products just by searching with an image. For each product, it provides: 
➡️ Product overview, including orders, wishlist, price, profit, and release date. 
➡️ Product review analysis and statistics. 
➡️ Trends in recent order volume, wishlist, and prices to reflect the product's recent market performance. 
➡️ Concise customer feedback analysis. 
➡️ Shipping reports based on different logistics options. 
➡️ A list of Shopify competitors selling the same product, giving you insights into the competition.  
💰 2. Intelligent Product Recommendations ShopifyHunt provides two types of recommendations: one based on product similarity and the other on sales volume. 
➡️ Easily find products similar to the one you're viewing while assessing the reputation of corresponding AliExpress sellers. This way, you can compare prices and lower costs, maximizing profits. 
➡️ Unsure what to sell today? Check out our AI-selected popular products! We pick 40 of the best-selling AliExpress products daily, based on sales over the past 7 or 14 days. You can find them on the homepage, category page, and search result pages. 
 💰 3. Download Product Videos, Images We understand your next step after finding a product to sell — listing it in your own store. That’s why we offer unlimited access to download product images, including videos, main images, variant images, and description images! 
💰 4. Search for Similar AliExpress Products Using Images You can search for products on AliExpress by image/photo (right-click any image on a webpage, then press the “ShopifyHunt” button). 
💰 5. Download Product Reviews We offer unlimited access to download product reviews, including review content and buyer showcases. 

How does this tool work? 
● Automatically identifies independent e-commerce stores. 
● Provides a list of store products that can be filtered by category. 
● Exports all or some store product data to Excel/CSV files. 
● Produces CSV files compatible with independent store imports. 
● Includes all store product list fields, such as title, vendor, description, creation and update dates, tags, prices, variants, images, etc. 
● No limit on the number of stores or products. 
● Completely free.

How to use this tool on Shopify? 
● Visit any independent store you want to monitor through the Chrome browser. 
● Click the extension icon. 
● Select all or some of the products. 
● Click the "Export to Excel/CSV" button in the pop-up window. 
● You can then export product information to Excel/CSV files, and these files will be compatible with the store's backend import format.

How to use this tool on AliExpress? Install it in your Chrome browser, visit aliexpress.com, and the extension will automatically perform all tasks for you!

You will find bestseller charts on the homepage, category pages, and search result pages.
Each result under your search will display an additional extension info panel, showing key data about the product.
Click the floating ShopifyHunt icon on the product detail page, and you will be impressed by the detailed product and store analysis.
With this automatic store parser & AliExpress product analysis tool, you can launch store monitoring in one click and outsmart your competitors!
long.sk,sl,sr:
The must-have Shopify&Dropship tool for Dropshipping sellers.

This is a shopify store analysis tool helps you inspect your competitors' stores product strategy and their best selling products. Make unbelievable profits for your Store in dropshipping business!

Main Feature
(1) Store Analysis
● Automatically identify Shopify stores. 
● Analysis store information including: store name, theme, product price and so on.
● Show the new addad products and best selling products
● Provide the release trend of products, vendor distribute analysis, & product tag analysis.

(2) Store's products
● Show the bestselling products and new added products of the Store.
● Provide a list of products that can be filtered by category
● All product listing field including title, price, images and so on，and provide links to help you easily find the products you want to see
● Export products data to Excel/CSV document, which is compatible with Shopify store import, then you can upload them directly to your own store

(3) Live Sales
● Check out the live sales of any Shopify stores,  find the most popular products.
● Simply keep the page open and you will be able to count the sales of the store and the products sold during the period.

 (4) Review Export
● Free Download all reviews.
● You can import the downloaded reviews directly into your online store.

(5) Apps and Tools
● Reveal the secret apps that drive sales for your competitor stores.

How to use ShopifyHunt?
Visit any Shopify store with Chrome that you want to analysis, and view all the informtion on the extension panel.

The term 'Shopify' is a trademark of Shopify,Inc. This application uses the Shopify API but is not endorsed or certified by Shopify
long.zh_CN:
针对Shopify店铺进行了全方面分析，包括店铺产品、广告流量、销售情况等， 以便您快速了解某个店铺。

支持速卖通产品的分析，支持分析列表页多个产品，帮您快速找到利基产品。单个产品分析更加详细，进一步帮助您判断产品优劣势。产品评论分析，获取消费者的购买动机和期望。支持1688，速卖通，shopify等平台上搜索同款货源寻找。

1. ShopifyHunt是替您监控电子商务、独立站和一件代发业务竞争对手的最佳帮手。
我们的工具帮助您揭示竞争对手的盈利秘密。只需单击一下，您就可以深入了解竞争对手的产品研究和定价策略。将这些获奖技巧应用到您的一件代发业务中，您的一件代发业务和独立站商店商店将越来越受欢迎。您的销售额将以您从未想象过的速度上涨！

2. 通过对速卖通每一件商品进行全面分析，以及每天的热销商品推荐，让您不再为下一步卖什么而烦恼！ 
您可以利用ShopifyHunt快速比价、评估卖家信誉，以最大化您的利润空间！
您还可以提前了解销售同款商品的 Shopify竞争对手，让您的决定更加慎重！

👋 👋 主要功能有哪些？
——————————————————————————————————
💰 1.速卖通产品研究
使用 ShopifyHunt，您只需按图片搜索即可找到价格更低、销量更高的同类产品。
对于每件产品提供：
➡️ 商品概览，包括订单、愿望清单、价格、利润和发布日期。
➡️ 商品的评论分析、统计
➡️ 近期订单量、愿望清单和价格的趋势，作为商品近期市场表现的参考。
➡️ 简单明了的客户反馈分析。
➡️ 根据不同的物流选择，给出对应的运费报告。
➡️ 销售相同产品的 Shopify 竞争对手列表，让您了解竞争情况。
——————————————————————————————————
💰 2. 智能的产品推荐
ShopifyHunt提供两种类型的推荐，一种基于产品相似度，一种基于销量。
➡️您可以轻松找到与您浏览的产品相似的产品，同时评估相应速卖通卖家的信誉。
通过这种方式比较价格、降低成本，使收益最大化。
➡️ 如果您不知道今天要卖什么，为什么不先看看我们的 AI 挑选的热门产品？
我们每天都会根据过去 7 天或 14 天的销售额，挑选出 40 款最畅销的速卖通产品。您可以在首页、分类页面和搜索结果页面上找到它们。
——————————————————————————————————
💰 3. 下载产品视频、图片
我们知道您在找到要出售的产品后的下一步行动——上架到您自己的商店。
因此，我们为您提供无限制下载产品图像的权限，包括视频、主图像、变体图像和描述图像！
——————————————————————————————————
💰 4. 通过速卖通图片搜索相似速卖通商品
您可以通过图片/照片在速卖通中搜索商品（右键单击网页上的任何图像，然后按“ShopifyHunt”按钮）。
——————————————————————————————————
💰 5. 商品的评论下载
我们为您提供无限制下载产品评论的权限，包括评论内容、卖家秀。
——————————————————————————————————

这个工具是如何工作的？
● 自动识别独立站商店。
● 提供可按类别筛选的目标独立站商店产品列表
● 将所有或部分独立站商店产品数据导出到Excel/CSV文档
● 与独立站商店导入兼容的CSV文档
● 所有独立站产品列表字段，包括标题、供应商、描述、创建和更新时间、标签、价格、变体、图像等
● 独立站商店或产品的数量没有限制
● 完全免费

在shopify如何使用这个工具？
●通过chrome浏览器访问任何你想要监控的独立站商店
● 单击扩展图标
● 选择全部或部分产品
● 在弹出窗口中单击“导出Excel/CSV”按钮
● 然后，您可以将产品信息导出到Excel/CSV，该导出文件格式与独立站后台的导入格式兼容。

在aliexpress如何使用这个工具？
需将其安装到您的 Chrome 浏览器上，访问 aliexpress.com，该扩展程序就会自动为您执行所有操作！
1. 您会在首页、分类页面和搜索结果页面找到最畅销的图表。
2. 在您搜索的每个结果下，会出现附加的扩展信息面板，上面陈列了关于商品的核心数据。
3. 点击商品详情页面上悬浮的ShopifyHunt图标，您会对其中详尽的商品分析和店铺分析留下深刻的印象。

通过这个自动独立站商店解析器&速卖通产品的分析工具，一键启动独立站监控并击败您的竞争对手！
